about_the_game:
Through the Stars is an engaging blend of deck-building roguelike and turn-based tactics, where you lead a small space fleet to break through enemy lines and save your planet's population. The planet's defense is on the brink of collapse, and only you can change the course of events.

Every decision you make matters. Explore a minimalist cosmos where the global adventure map is randomly generated, creating unique challenges at every turn. Collect cards representing abilities and upgrades for your ships that you can use in battle. Develop your deck by earning new cards as rewards for victories or purchasing them in the shop.

The combat system consists of two phases: first, you select a ship and move it, and then you play cards that determine your ship's actions. Tactical challenges require careful planning, and the ability to utilize the environment on the map adds depth to strategic thinking.

Fight against a variety of enemies, from regular foes to powerful bosses, each requiring a unique approach. Experience satisfaction from finding unconventional moves and solving tactical puzzles as you fight for your planet's salvation.

Join the adventure in Through the Stars and become the last hope of the galaxy!
